title: OCE Desperately needs Dynamic Queue for Normals ASAP
body: Sick of Yi and Xin getting played every other game. Sick of Mirror Matches. Sick of Instalockers. Sick of just *happening* to have a team with no tools to deal with a problematic enemy champion/composition.

replies.body:
i actually agree going from normals to ranked is such a massive step in quality of queing

i can honestly only think of playing normals if i had was stoned that way i can tolerate the people
I feel you doge. Totally what I do hehehe

what about low level people that don't have 16 champs? what about new players that don't know anything about the game?
for newer players, the current champ select for normals is infinitely better than dynamic que.
inb4 "what about level 30 players?" you have ranked, use that.
